A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is proof that great acting and great effects cannot save a film from a terrible story. \nSo many moments felt like they happened just to spit in the face of fan theories and be unpredictable. But that resulted in thoroughly unsatisfying answers to questions asked in The Force Awakens. I no longer have any interest in the continuation of this saga. Episode IX could be about dancing ewoks in tutus and it wouldn't make a difference anymore.
